title: Diagnostic Assessment and Improvement Strategies for Educational Product Development Project Management Maturity

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training where current practitioners diagnose organizational status and derive improvement plans using project management maturity assessment tools

learning_goals: Measure project management maturity levels of educational product development organizations using a 5-stage evaluation scale
Diagnose organizational project management competency gaps by analyzing survey results
Three project management improvement strategies suitable for the educational product development process can be proposed
An optimization plan for role distribution between project managers and instructional designers can be designed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
